TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Itchy papules that are brownish-red in color and typically appear on the shins, thighs, feet, or neck.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "cutaneous lichen amyloidosis"
Photograph of the neck and upper back of an individual whose skin is covered with many small bumps that are brownish-red in color.
MediaLink.Caption: Cutaneous lichen amyloidosis is a condition in which itchy papules that are brownish-red in color typically appear on the shins, thighs, feet, or neck, as shown here.
